meanings.definition: A small, primitive arthropod of the class Pauropoda.
meanings.sent1: The pauropod scurried quickly across the forest floor.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the behavior of the pauropod in its natural habitat.
meanings.sent3: The tiny pauropod wore a top hat and monocle for the insect ball.
meanings.sent4: In the miniature world of the garden, the pauropod is a giant explorer.
meanings.sent5: Children love to imagine tiny pauropods having their own adventures.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to the class Pauropoda.
meanings.sent1: The researcher discovered a new species with distinct pauropod characteristics.
meanings.sent2: The pauropod habitat provides a unique environment for other creatures.
meanings.sent3: The garden gnome had a pauropod-inspired design, complete with tiny legs.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a pauropod maze, full of intricate connections and pathways.
meanings.sent5: The artist's painting captured the essence of the pauropod world in vibrant colors.
